Initial commit: WebRTC Screen Share Demo

Features:

- Multiple codec support: H.264, HEVC, VP8, VP9, AV1
- Configurable resolution, framerate, and bitrate
- Settings persistence with localStorage
- Multi-viewer support
- Fullscreen playback
- Real-time statistics display

Tech stack:
- Client: Vue 3 + TypeScript + Vite + TailwindCSS
- Server: Node.js + Socket.io \(signaling\)
